name: Salvando la Isla Perdida
description:
Lost Island game sheet
Captain Karpin doesn't want there to be children on Isla Perdida. To achieve this, he wants to strip them of all their fundamental rights. In this way they will end up leaving the island and no other child will ever want to inhabit it.
But Bitter, Wendolyn and company will not allow it, although they may need help. You dare? You can do it alone or as a team, although we recommend playing together.
Escape room – Escape room designed for family play, but not necessarily. It offers challenges of different levels of difficulty and different nature, from a psychopedagogical perspective. A plot line and two clear objectives: rescue the fundamental rights of children in Isla Perdida and defeat Captain Karpin.
